titleStmt.title: A letter sent from Maynhem concerning the late defeate giuen the Duke of Brunswicke by Monsieur Tilley Whereunto is added a couranto of other newes from Vienna, Prague, the Palatinate and other places this 20. of Iune. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 17256 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
